spec_data.Name: gnome-activity-journal
spec_data.Description:
GNOME Activity Journal is a tool for easily
browsing and finding files on your computer.
It shows a chronological journal of all file
activity.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:25:14 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Browse and search your Zeitgeist activities
